title: A Surprise Attack Upends Israel and the Middle East
description: A shocking raid by Hamas upends Israel and the Middle East

title: The U.S. Will Send a Carrier Strike Group in Support of Israel
description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said  he has ordered the Ford carrier strike group to sail to the Eastern Mediterranean to be ready to assist Israel.

title: Here’s How the World Leaders Have Reacted to Hamas’ Surprise Attack on Israel
description: Global leaders have been watching tension in the Middle East escalate after Hamas unleashed an attack on Israel.

title: Israel Battles Hamas For a Second Day As the Death Toll From Mass Incursion Soars to 600
description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the country was at war and would exact a heavy price from its enemies.

title: Why Hamas Tried to Sabotage Arab-Israeli Peace Prospects with a Massive Unprovoked Attack
description: Exactly 50 years ago, two authors of tthis commentary raced out of Yom Kippur prayer services to cover the last surprise attack on Israel for news radio. Now we see Israel taken by surprise once again. The radical Palestinians of Hamas, governing the Gaza Strip since Israel’s withdrawal in 2005, managed to carry out an…
